a.detail:
Net Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 11 save or become restrained

c.detail: A crater has been blasted into the floor
c.summary: A crater has been blasted into the floor

e.detail: A toppled statue lies across the corridor
e.summary: A toppled statue lies across the corridor

i.detail:
Poison Gas Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 16 save or take 4d10 poison damage

m.detail: A tile labyrinth covers the floor
m.summary: A tile labyrinth covers the floor

n.detail:
Magic Missle Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    one target, 1d10 force damage

r.detail: An iron chandelier hangs from the ceiling here
r.summary: An iron chandelier hangs from the ceiling here

s.detail: The scent of smoke fills the corridor
s.summary: The scent of smoke fills the corridor

u.detail: A mouldy odor fills the corridor
u.summary: A mouldy odor fills the corridor

v.detail: A briny odor fills the corridor
v.summary: A briny odor fills the corridor

w.detail: Part of the ceiling has collapsed into the corridor
w.summary: Part of the ceiling has collapsed into the corridor

details.history: The dungeon was created by a neutral good druid as a temple. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Sharpen thy blade and ready thy shield" on the east wall, and the scent of smoke fills the south side of the room

south.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 25 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Trapped and Locked Stone Door (DC 15 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
west.trap:
Falling Block: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 10 save or take 1d10 damage

east.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
east.trap:
Guillotine Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +12 to hit against one target, 4d10 slashing damage

south.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 10 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Locked Iron Door (DC 15 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

detail.room_features: A chute descends from the room into a natural cavern below, and a pile of rotten fruit lies in the south side of the room

north.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 25 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

Guillotine Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +12 to hit against one target, 4d10 slashing damage

south.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Stone Door (60 hp)

    +8 to hit against one target, 2d10 cold damage

south.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)
south.secret: The door is concealed behind a tapestry of ancient mythology

monster: Treasure: 2400 cp, 1000 sp, 90 gp, chalcedony (50 gp), onyx (50 gp), +1 Wand of the War Mage (uncommon, dmg 212)
detail.room_features: A faded and torn tapestry hangs from the east wall, and an altar of evil sits in the south side of the room
trap:
Chain Flail: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    initiative +1, 1 attack per round, +11 to hit against all targets within 5 ft., 4d10 bludgeoning damage

north.desc: Trapped and Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

    one target, 2d10 force damage

monster: Treasure: 2200 cp, 900 sp, 70 gp, banded agate (10 gp), blue quartz (10 gp), 2 x lapis lazuli (10 gp), 2 x malachite (10 gp), 2 x moss agate (10 gp), tiger eye (10 gp), Potion of Fire Giant Strength (rare, dmg 187)

north.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)
north.secret: A bookcase and section of wall pivots smoothly

west.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp) (slides to one side)

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "I'd rather be at the Warrior's Purse" in dwarvish runes on the north wall, and the floor is covered with scorch marks

west.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

detail.room_features: The ceiling is covered with bloodstains, and a pile of rotten rope lies in the east side of the room

wandering_monsters.1: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); hard, 50 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.2: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); hard, 50 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.3: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); hard, 50 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.4: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); hard, 50 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.5: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); hard, 50 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.6: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); hard, 50 xp, actively patrolling their territory
